Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: project docs and platform plan v0.3

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Hugo site structure and GitHub Pages deployment

- Hugo config with platform navigation \(Games, Insights, Log, Commons, Team, Ethics\)
- Base layouts \(baseof, single, list, index\)
- Dark theme CSS matching research lab aesthetic
- Content stubs for all platform sections per v0.3 plan
- GitHub Actions workflow for automatic Hugo build and Pages deploy

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")
